dct_title_s: Map of property lines along the Hudson River in Ridgefield Township, N.J.
dct_description_sm: Hand-drawn survey map showing an overview of the properties along the Hudson River in Ridgefield Township, New Jersey
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Map is undated. Ridgefield Township existed at least in part from 1871 to 1904
